description: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your PostgreSQL databases. It includes replication, locks, and throughput etc...
title: Postgres overview

db_name.name: db_name
db_name.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'postgresql_database_name') AS db_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'postgresql_operations'
GROUP BY db_name

host_name.description: List of hosts sending Postgres metrics
host_name.name: host_name
host_name.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'host_name') AS host_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'postgresql_operations'
GROUP BY host_name

table_name.name: table_name
table_name.queryValue:
SELECT JSONExtractString(labels, 'postgresql_table_name') AS table_name
FROM signoz_metrics.distributed_time_series_v4_1day
WHERE metric_name = 'postgresql_operations' AND JSONExtractString(labels, 'postgresql_database_name') IN {{.db_name}}
GROUP BY table_name

widgets.description: The number of db insert operations.
widgets.title: Inserts

widgets.description: The number of db update operations.
widgets.title: Updates

widgets.description: The number of db delete operations.
widgets.title: Deleted

widgets.description: The number of db heap-only update operations.
widgets.title: Heap updates
